channel.title: Git on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Breaking Stuff on A List Apart
item.description: Last week my latest column, Breaking Stuff, was published on A List Apart. I’m in a strange transitional period, moving from client work to fulltime at ind.ie, so I think I’ll be writing more about situations like these as time goes on. I’ve also finally updated that terrible avatar to something much better. I look uncharacteristically pale, but at least I’m normal colours! (Unlike the last terrible photo I’d used.)
